name: The Punchcutter
description:
I have hand-coloured this woodcut by 16th Century illustrator Jost Amman, bringing new life to this piece of history.

Jost Amman was an Austro-German artist who, among other things, illustrated with woodcuts "The Book of Trades" ("Das Standebuch"), published in 1568. I am making a colourised series of his woodcuts from this book as NFTs.

This punchcutter is preparing a letter punch to produce a typeface for use in letterpress printing.
